#BlackMagicCraft #Episode114

When creative block strikes, the best thing to do is stubbornly build your way through it. That's what I did this week, and it left me with a set of cool colour changing "arcane summoning stones". These will be a nice bit of interactive terrain for a final encounter with a powerful spell caster. Great for Dungeons & Dragons.

BUY SUPPLIES TO TACKLE THIS BUILD
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)
